quest.name: Keeping the Faith
journal: Nigen is worried about yet another family member.
objectives: Find Nigen's sister and slay any enemies that appear.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Allow me to thank you once again for helping my brother. Would you be able to aid my sister as well? Our family is somewhat troubled...

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: The gods told her to go and gather water from the river to the west. However, many beasts lurk in the area. I worry she will be set upon as my brother was.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Yet again I am unable to accompany her as the elder gods have given me my own work.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Could I ask you to check on her in my stead? She should still be gathering water to the west.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Please check on my sister in my stead. She should still be gathering water to the west.

dialogue.name: YOUNGNIGEN
dialogue.text: Thank you so much, kind stranger. I am in your debt.

dialogue.name: YOUNGNIGEN
dialogue.text: Tell me, have you heard of this river before? Its water is said to have healing propertiesâ”€one drink and all your ailments shall be gone!

dialogue.name: YOUNGNIGEN
dialogue.text: I imagine that someone in the village is going to fall sick shortly. That is surely why the gods bid me to gather water from the river.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Did you find my sister? She is still yet to return.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Thank you for your help. My sister is returned at last.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: It seems you have influenced my siblings quite profoundly. They too have decided to become adventurers!

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: No doubt the elder gods foresaw this when they sent them out on their errands. I am most excited to hear of their adventures in the future.
